TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class InputManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 管理 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中的所有輸入的系統。

span.span: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責協調所有輸入的系統中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。The class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 篩選條件是接聽的任何程式碼或。A filter is any code that listens to or . 篩選可以修改輸入的預備區域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 監視器就會接聽任何程式碼或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 監視器無法修改輸入的預備區域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 控制輸入的預備區域。The controls the input staging area. 輸入的預備區域處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件。The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events. 在處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]後續階段中：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 前置處理階段。Pre-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 預先通知階段。Pre-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知後階段。Post-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 後置處理階段。Post-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別在網際網路區域中將無法使用。This class will not be available in Internet zone.

permission.span: 取得目前的輸入的管理員。

span.span: for getting the current input manager.
Associated enumerations:

summary.span: 發生於控制項呼叫 方法而進入功能表模式時。

span.span: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會向這個事件來回應輸入的輸入的管理員功能表模式的控制項中的委派。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager's menu mode.

summary.span: 發生於點擊測試的結果可能已經變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsInMenuMode As Boolean
public: property bool IsInMenuMode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示此 是否處於功能表模式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this is in menu mode.

value.span: 如果這個 處於功能表模式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this is in menu mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`如果任何功能表已開啟，而且它會傳回`false`如果沒有功能表已開啟。The property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.

summary.span: 發生於控制項呼叫 方法而離開功能表模式時。

span.span: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會向這個事件來回應離開的輸入的管理員功能表模式的控制項中的委派。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager's menu mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to leave.

summary.span: 由元件呼叫來離開功能表模式。

span.span: Called by components to leave menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會呼叫此方法來離開的輸入的管理員功能表模式。A component calls this method to leave the input manager's menu mode. `menuSite`釋出視窗訊息的特殊權限的存取。The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages. 呼叫這個方法會導致內部開啟選單，以遞減的計數，並設定屬性設`false`，如果這是關閉的最後一個功能表。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.

summary.span: 發生於 處理常式完成輸入處理且對應的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 事件已引發之後。

span.span: Occurs after the handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 監視器就會接聽任何程式碼或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 監視器無法修改輸入的預備區域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 處理常式附加至，讓使用者所加入的處理常式之前叫用處理常式在系統中時以相反順序叫用。The handlers attached to are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system. 在處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]後續階段中：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 前置處理階段。Pre-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 預先通知階段。Pre-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知後階段。Post-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 後置處理階段。Post-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ProcessInput(class System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs input) cil managed
Public Function ProcessInput (input As InputEventArgs) As Boolean

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Security.SecurityCritical

span.span: The input to process.
Processes the specified input synchronously.

returns.span: 如果處理了所有輸入事件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if all input events were handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 篩選條件是接聽的任何程式碼或。A filter is any code that listens to or . 篩選可以修改輸入的預備區域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 監視器就會接聽任何程式碼或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 監視器無法修改輸入的預備區域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 指定的輸入處理的所有篩選器和監視，以及最後會分派至適當的項目，做為輸入的事件。The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event. 在處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]後續階段中：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 前置處理階段。Pre-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 預先通知階段。Pre-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知後階段。Post-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 後置處理階段。Post-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event.

for processing the specified input.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PushMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to enter.

summary.span: 由元件呼叫來進入功能表模式。

span.span: Called by components to enter menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會呼叫這個方法，以輸入的輸入的管理員功能表模式。A component calls this method to enter the input manager's menu mode. `menuSite`取得特殊權限的存取權視窗訊息。The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages. 呼叫這個方法會導致內部開啟選單，以遞增的計數，並設定屬性設`true`，如果這是開啟的第一個功能表。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.

span.span: is .
